heading: Pedal clavichord music.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for solo pedal clavichord, and collections of compositions in several forms or types for solo pedal clavichord..

The "pedal clavichord" is used as a medium of performance in headings for works for one or two solo instruments. In headings for other works that include pedal clavichord, the generic term "clavichord" is used as the medium of performance..
